Please check Wi-Fi password and try again\r\n\r\nError code:1021 Could not connect to Wio Wi-fi hotspot, please try again or manually choose Wio\'s Wi-Fi hotspot in system settings.\r\n\r\n Error code:1031 Please connect to Wi-Fi network before you start Connect server… You are not connected to Wi-fi Detail Choose a Server This option is for users who registered with our old Global Server.

Because we are making changes our server architecture, our old Global Server will be terminated on September 1, 2016. At that time, all your data will be transferred automatically to new Global Server.
